column2: "...<%me>! Grab that sword and run us through! Free her... and me!!"
"...She is now freed from this tragic cycle... and [Profound Darkness] will cease to exist."
"Ahh... It's been so long. So very, very long..."
"Forgive me, <%me>. I've caused you great trouble... and many painful memories."
"Our wishes were granted... [Profound Darkness] is defeated, and the universe will find peace."
"...This, too, is a single answer. But the answer is not singular."
"Your karmic destiny has been interwoven. A new answer lies ahead."

"あなたの行動により、新たな可能性が生まれました。
ストーリークエスト【EP3】『決断の日』を確認してください。"
